languages.text: "Это щедро и милосердно. Но я не намерен эксплуатировать ваше доверие вновь".
"That is generous and gracious. But I have no intention of exploiting your trust again."
languages.original_text: "Это щедро и милосердно. Но я не намерен эксплуатировать ваше доверие вновь".

traits.locale_text: "That is generous and gracious. But I have no intention of exploiting your trust again."
"That is generous and gracious. But I have no intention of exploiting your trust again."
"That is generous and gracious. But I have no intention of exploiting your trust again."
"That is generous and gracious. But I have no intention of exploiting your trust again."
"That is generous and gracious. But I have no intention of exploiting your trust again."

languages.text: « C'est très généreux et courtois de votre part, mais je n'ai pas l'intention de continuer à exploiter votre confiance. »
languages.original_text: "That is generous and gracious. But I have no intention of exploiting your trust again."

traits.locale_text: « C'est très généreux et courtois de votre part, mais je n'ai pas l'intention de continuer à exploiter votre confiance. »

languages.text: 「寛大で思いやりのあるお言葉ですね。ですが、もう二度とあなたの信頼を裏切るつもりはありません」
languages.original_text: "That is generous and gracious. But I have no intention of exploiting your trust again."

traits.locale_text: 「寛大で思いやりのあるお言葉ですね。ですが、もう二度とあなたの信頼を裏切るつもりはありません」

languages.text: «Es generoso y amable por su parte. Pero no tengo intención de aprovecharme de su confianza otra vez».
languages.original_text: "That is generous and gracious. But I have no intention of exploiting your trust again."

traits.locale_text: «Es generoso y amable por su parte. Pero no tengo intención de aprovecharme de su confianza otra vez».

languages.text: “你的说法很慷慨，也很亲切，但我不打算再次辜负你的信任了。”
languages.original_text: "That is generous and gracious. But I have no intention of exploiting your trust again."

traits.locale_text: “你的说法很慷慨，也很亲切，但我不打算再次辜负你的信任了。”

languages.text: "Çok cömert ve bağışlayıcısınız. Güveninizi tekrar boşa çıkarmayacağıma söz veriyorum."
languages.original_text: "That is generous and gracious. But I have no intention of exploiting your trust again."

traits.locale_text: "Çok cömert ve bağışlayıcısınız. Güveninizi tekrar boşa çıkarmayacağıma söz veriyorum."

languages.text: "Das ist großzügig und gnädig. Aber ich will Euer Vertrauen nicht noch einmal missbrauchen."
languages.original_text: "That is generous and gracious. But I have no intention of exploiting your trust again."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist großzügig und gnädig. Aber ich will Euer Vertrauen nicht noch einmal missbrauchen."
